snippet.title: Forerunner Launch Trailer | Halo Infinite
snippet.description:
Join the fight for the Mantle in Halo Infinite for Operation: Forerunner! Experience the all-new Husky Assault along with fresh modes like multi-site Extraction & Assault in BTB: Refresh—coming later this Operation! 

Unlock the free 20-tier Operation Pass and earn the Prefect armor set, or upgrade to the Premium Pass to unlock the Promethean Assault Rifle weapon model for your MA40 and Steel Fall weapon coating. 

This event runs until May 6, so gear up for epic battles, legendary rewards, and more! 

https://aka.ms/ForerunnerLaunch

#halo #haloinfinite #haloforerunner
